ValidationRule.description: "Customized template if needed" must be 0, 1, 3 or 5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Customer_Care_Quality_Form", OR ( NOT(CONTAINS("0,1,3,5", TEXT(Customized_Template_If_Needed__c))), ISNULL(Customized_Template_If_Needed__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please update your value to: 0 for N/A, 1 for NO, 3 for PARTIALLY COMPLETED or 5 for YES.
